Programs

Our programs are designed with you in mind

Our programs are designed and taught by seasoned experts to help entrepreneurs remodel their businesses so as to stay relevant and maintain competitiveness in the global market.
Professional Programs

Digital Marketing

Product Design

Lead generation and Sales conversion

Core Advertising Solutions

Advertising

Digital Transformation For Businesses

Leverage digital technologies and channels to build new systems and processes for your business. Create and exploit already existing opportunities with the help of digital tools, marketing insights, and business development strategies.

Learn more

Actualise your vision

We understand that individuals go into business for various reasons. 

Yours may be;

To provide support for your family and loved ones

To solve problems and foster change in the world

To inspire your generation and the next

To disrupt and dominate a particular industry

To pursue and fulfill your lifelong passion

Whatever your vision may be, let us partner with you in actualising it.

 

Visions we’ve been part of and helped actualise

Testimonials

Toba Olugosi,
Client Relationship Manager,
Lagos Business School

"My job was one of the things that took a hit during the pandemic. I was devastated by this but a respected senior friend convinced me to go and improve my skills at PDMA so I'd be indispensable. He wasn't wrong. In 4 short weeks, the improvement was so obvious and profound that Lagos Business School approached me. In a very short while, using what I learned at PDMA, I did not just land a job, I rose to Manager ranks at Lagos Business School. Looking back, I am glad the last job ended...but I am most glad I went to PDMA."

MRS BAMIDELE CEO, NAILSCOPE

"PDMA

MY BUSINESS BLEW AT PDMA!

A few weeks into my training, the instructors kept insisting we tried out what we had learned. So, I used one of the sales strategies we were taught alongside a sales copy we were given... and BOOM! Millions of naira in a matter of weeks in my business. I could not believe it, especially since I initially thought they were just talking story at PDMA. I am still reaping the benefits of enrolling at PDMA."

PRECIOUS AHAMEFULA

BEN IKADE

"PDMA

MY BUSINESS BLEW AT PDMA!

A few weeks into my training, the instructors kept insisting we tried out what we had learned. So, I used one of the sales strategies we were taught alongside a sales copy we were given... and BOOM! Millions of naira in a matter of weeks in my business. I could not believe it, especially since I initially thought they were just talking story at PDMA. I am still reaping the benefits of enrolling at PDMA."

"PDMA

I AM DOING WELL!

I loved marketing, the only problem was I didn't know how to do it. I knew I had to start from somewhere and I am glad I started from PDMA. PDMA started from the basics of marketing before we went into digital marketing and that was my eureka moment. I would have just known the tools and been totally clueless about converting customers. Today, I am the lead strategist for several multination brands and I can't even lie, PDMA laid the foundation for this career I am enjoying today."

IFEOLUWA ISRAEL

"After graduating from University, I knew needed digital skills if this economy was going to favor me. It didn’t take long to find PDMA, and I am glad I did. My experience at PDMA positioned me to land a job right after my graduation where I manage local international brands…it didn’t even take time to happen. I am really happy cos truly when you weigh it against the value you get, PDMA is just doing giveaways to help people like me get their lives started. PDMA Should Charge More"

business

How you will learn

Take our programs via different modes, depending on your preferences and peculiarities.

Physical Classes

Undergo our digital marketing training program, and enjoy your journey towards success with like-minded course mates at our physical campus.

Online Classes

Our online training program, which includes virtual and E-learning, offers the flexibility of studying completely online, on the go, at your own pace, and from the comfort of your home!

Corporate

Ramp up your digital and tech team for business success. Our corporate training program offers the flexibility of customising our training schedules and location to fit your team.
